sentence.Network_en: They were not insensible of the risks.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们对这些危险并非没有意识。

sentence.Network_en: She shouldn't restrain her anger at this insensible attitude of theirs.
sentence.Network_cn: 对他们这种无动于衷的态度,她抑制不住心头的怒火.

sentence.Network_en: We are not insensible of your kindness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们并非不知你的好意.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(I3) ... insensibility 无感觉 insensible 无知觉的 insensibly 不知不觉地.
insenescence 衰老insensible 意识不到的insensitive 不敏感的
GCT英语高频词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... incapable 无能力的 insensible 麻木不仁的 intelligent 聪明的.
大学英语四级考试试题_湖心亭看雪_新浪博客 ... incapable 无能力的； insensible 昏迷的，不醒人事的； infinite 无限的，无穷的。.

list.abs: e．g．fall insensible 昏过去insensible motion 极缓慢的运动be insensible of one's danger 不知道自己所面临的危险.
...  1,不感蒸发,不感蒸发,insensible perspiration, 是指体液的水分从皮肤和黏膜,主要是呼吸道黏膜,表面不断渗出而被汽化的形式.
e.g.fall insensible 昏过去  insensible motion 极缓慢的运动  be insensible of one's danger 不知道自己所面临的危险  be insensitive to the public.
pain asymbolia 无痛症pain insensibility 无痛症pancreatitis 胰腺炎

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the senses 'unable to be perceived' and 'incapable of physical sensation'): partly from Old French insensible (from Latin insensibilis, from in- 'not' + sensibilis, from sensus 'sense'), partly from in- 'not' + sensible

means.word_mean: 2. (followed by `to' or `by') unaware of or indifferent to;

sentences.sentence: "he lay insensible where he had fallen"

auth_sentence.content: Passing by insensible gradations into the next sense.
auth_sentence.res_content: Passing by insensible gradations into the next sense.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Passing by insensible gradations into the next sense.

auth_sentence.content: It opens "on a winter's night, clear and cold, glacially insensible to human suffering," to quote the composer.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It opens "on a winter's night, clear and cold, glacially insensible to human suffering," to quote the composer.

means.word_mean: 无知觉的;不知道的,没有觉察的;无感觉的;(尤指)无疼痛感觉的

sentences.en: insensible after a hit on the head
sentences.cn: 头上挨了打击昏迷不省
